attributes.action: move the Prime Minister's residence and office from 10 Downing Street to a bigger more modern building
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK Prime Minister should have bigger and modern modern premises on which to entertain foreign dignitaries and heads of state, and conduct the work of a head of government. It may be tradition, but 10 Downing Street is tiny in comparison to the White House and Elysée Palace. A country of our importance in the world and an office of such importance should not be located in a small town house.
